Controls:
swipe left/right - move
swipe down - drop
swipe up - rotate
tap on left/right - rotate colors
hit home - pause the game

Tap on logo to start!

Color Throne
Free Version


Dear User , thank you for your interest in this game.

If you like the game, want a stable release with updates and new features and no annoying messages, then please consider buying a paid version. It\'s dirt cheap and this way you will thank the developer.

Thank you for playing!
